definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: The robber abduct the heiress and hold her to ransom.
sentences.chinese: 强盗劫持了女继承人并向她索取赎金。

sentences.english: Detail brochure is available from the local Camfil Farr Sales Office.
sentences.chinese: 详细说明请从当地的康斐尔公司销售处索取。

sentences.english: The kidnappers levied a ransom on the child's parents.
sentences.chinese: 绑匪向小孩的父母索取赎金。

sentences.english: Some drivers charge as much as ten times the legal fare .
sentences.chinese: 有些司机索取的车资高达原法定车资的十倍。

sentences.english: Or call into one PDSA's shops to pick up an entry form.
sentences.chinese: 当然你也可以电话生病动物之家来索取参赛表格。

sentences.english: In this case the proforma invoice is required for a third party.
sentences.chinese: 这里述及的形式发票是为第三者索取的。

sentences.english: Get your invation card at church's counter and invite your friend.
sentences.chinese: 在教会柜台索取你的邀请卡并邀请你的朋友。

sentences.english: The mechanics for claiming this income tax allowance were developed by the district .
sentences.chinese: 该保护区发展了索取这种所得税补贴费的技巧。

sentences.english: You may write for the booklist.
Application forms are now available at the College Dean of Students' Office.
sentences.chinese: 进修计划申请表格可到书院辅导处索取。

sentences.english: We will draw on you for the expenses .
sentences.chinese: 我们将开出汇票向你方索取费用。

sentences.english: It requests the usual free literature and politely asks for an additional item: samples.
sentences.chinese: 先要求索取赠阅目录，再礼貌地要求提供样本。

sentences.english: So, one partner ask for breakup, then another partner can have the reason to ask for breakup fee?
sentences.chinese: 那么一方提出分手，另一方就有理由要索取分手费吗？

sentences.english: The applicant should be responsible for the costs incurred in the request for the transcript.
sentences.chinese: 申请人须自行负责有关索取学业成绩表之费用。

sentences.english: And we would have to charge you for drilling open the box and replacing the lock .
sentences.chinese: 因为钻开箱子和重新换锁，我们还要向您索取费用。

sentences.english: Please contact us at 2802 0021 for a Donor No. The official receipt will be sent upon receiving the donation.
sentences.chinese: 向本会索取捐款者号码，收据将在收到捐款后寄上。

definition: to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to give in charity/to give alms (to the poor)
